title: History Extra podcast - December 2008 - Part 1
itunes:title: History Extra podcast - December 2008 - Part 1
itunes:subtitle: Stephen Conway returns to 1775, Professor Mark Connelly describes how the Victorians began to shop until they dropped, The 'father of history' on one of the great ancient civilisations.
description:
Stephen Conway returns to 1775, Professor Mark Connelly describes how the Victorians began to shop until they dropped, The 'father of history' on one of the great ancient civilisations.
